newsitem.title: CHINA: Shenzhen bank says finds irregularities.
newsitem.headline: Shenzhen bank says finds irregularities.

text.p: Shenzhen Development Bank Co, a market barometer on the Shenzhen stock exchange, said on Monday it had found that the bank itself had been involved in irregularities in stock trading in 1996.
A statement by the board of directors said the firm was conducting investigations and that it would make further announcements as details became available.

"Through self-examination, our bank has found that it was itself involved in irregularities in its stock trading business in 1996," the statement, published in the Shanghai Securities News. It gave no details.
